attributes.action: Independent Comission to see how much UK laws are influenced by the EU
attributes.additional_details:
Every political party says the EU plays a different amount in UK laws, but there is no exact figure.
How is anyone meant to know how much influence the EU has over the UK if there is no definite percentage?
That's why I propose an independent comission (so there is no bias) to find out the real percentage how much influence the EU actually has in the UK.

rejection.details: You have submitted this petition twice.
